content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) storing iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0) smelting iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) smelting copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) making copper cables
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) storing copper cables
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow
- Connected belt system for material transport

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) making electronic circuits
- Input chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5) storing electronic circuits
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 34.5)
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Connected via extensive pipe network
- Currently not operational due to missing power connections

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Power Connections
- Ensure you have the required items (small electric poles) in inventory before attempting to make power connections
- Power connections must be made between entities within connection range

### Entity Connection Issues
- When connecting fluid-based entities (pumps, boilers, steam engines), ensure proper pipe connections are made
- Entities must be properly powered to function - check electrical connections

### Production Line Issues
- Assembling machines require power to function
- Ensure proper material input flow through inserters and belts
- Check recipe requirements are met before starting production

### Resource Management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities
- Ensure proper item flow between storage chests and production facilities
